name: Markdown blog
intro: Modern, lightweight theme with a typography-focused design. Powered by Markdown and Next.js.

title: About the project
paragraph: A simple, easy solution for your first blog with support for multiple locales. The website is optimized and responsive, and comes with alternative themes: light and dark. The data comes from your Markdown files located in the posts folder.

title: How does it work
paragraph: This project comes out of the box with support for English (EN) and German (DE) languages, using separate files to keep data organized. The Code is simple and easy to understand, and can be easily customized by changing colors, fonts, or adding new languages. To generate a new post, create a new folder inside of the posts folder with the name of the article. That name will show up as a link on the page.
